name: Attack of the Oculoids
description:
The Oculoids are here!  Get'em!

Oh... one thing... all those magic weapons you have?  Yeah, Oculoids don't respond to magic like most things.  So, you might need to experiment.  You should be fine though.

Created in 7 days for the 7DFPS gamejame entirely by Lee Perry (although with a song from SoundRangers).  Sorry about the lack of good gameplay sounds, just ran out of time and I was crazy ambitious :-/  Anyway, enjoy!!!
